text: Montana was a municipality of the district of Sierre in the canton of Valais in Switzerland. It was one of the six municipalities that form the ski resort Crans-Montana (together with Icogne, Lens, Randogne, Mollens and Chermignon). On 1 January 2017, the former municipalities of Montana, Chermignon, Mollens and Randogne merged into the new municipality of Crans-Montana. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website * Category:Former municipalities of Valais
title: Montana, Switzerland
